messages.content: I need a 5 by 4 metal sign
To ensure we can connect if disconnected, can you please share your email address?
sfdj
Thank you for sharing your email address! Could you please tell me a bit about what kind of sign you're looking for — and any other details you'd like us to know?
My email is ahmad2720000@gmail.com
Thank you for sharing your email address! Could you please tell me a bit about what kind of sign you're looking for — and any other details you'd like us to know?
I need a 5 by 4 metal sign in budget of 1000$ by 30th of August

Gotcha! So, we have a 5 by 4 metal sign with a budget of $1000, and you're looking to have it by August 30th. 

To create an accurate mockup and quote, I just need a few more details. 

Where will this sign be installed? On a brick wall, concrete, drywall, or another type of surface?
Brick Wall

Perfect! So, we have the installation surface as a brick wall. 

Is the sign going to be installed indoors or outdoors?
Outdoors

Awesome! So, we have the sign going outdoors. 

In which city and state do you want the sign to be delivered?
Tuijana Mexico

Thanks for that! So, we have the delivery location as Tijuana, Mexico. 

Do you need assistance with permit and installation?
No

Alrighty! So, just to recap, we have a 5 by 4 metal sign, to be installed on a brick wall outdoors, with a budget of $1000, and you need it delivered to Tijuana, Mexico by August 30th. 

Our designers will create a mockup based on these details, and you can expect it very shortly. 

Thanks a ton for your time! If you have any other questions or need anything else, feel free to reach out. Talk soon!
Can you tell me about which mounting will be used

Great question! The mounting options can vary based on the installation surface and the sign's design. For a brick wall, we typically recommend using masonry anchors or brackets to securely attach the sign. 

If you have any specific preferences or requirements for the mounting, feel free to share! Otherwise, our team will ensure the best mounting solution is provided for your sign. 

Is there anything else you'd like to know?
I need to include my logo also
That's perfect! Please go ahead and upload your logo files so our designers can work with your brand assets.
I've uploaded my logo: Screenshot 2025-05-30 160908.png

Awesome! I see that you've uploaded your logo. 

To wrap things up, just to recap: we have a 5 by 4 metal sign, to be installed on a brick wall outdoors, with a budget of $1000, and you need it delivered to Tijuana, Mexico by August 30th. 

Any changes in the requirement? If not, our designers will create a mockup based on the gathered details, and you can expect it very shortly. 

Thanks a ton for your time! If you have any other questions or need anything else, feel free to reach out. Cheers!
